## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G48540](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G48540)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>DCD</u>
- **Gene Name:** DEOXYCYTIDINE MONOPHOSPHATE DEAMINASE
- **Description:**   Cytidine/deoxycytidylate deaminase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2114490
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [dcd-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No obvious morphological phenotype.  Accumula tion of dCTP and a reduction of dTMP was detected in the dcd mutant compared to the wild-type.
